title: [Medicine] Scientists have identified a chemical cocktail that induces totipotent stem cells(TotiSCs) in mice at will, to create life from non-germline

[Health] T-cells in bone marrow work to drive inflammatory multiple sclerosis attacks. Myelin-reactive T-cells migrate to the bone marrow to promote the growth of myeloid cells that contribute to inflammation. Disrupting these processes could be a therapeutic approach for MS
